He came back in 1992.

And so, and this man was a Canadian citizen, Somali by birth, eighth or ninth in line as

He forgave me for running away from this man.

And at some point it came out.

And I think, and I've said this, this is the subject, part of the subject of nomad, is

And my father proved that.
He's proved it to me.
